Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2001 SPRING ROAD,SUITE 400, OAK BROOK, Illinois, 60523, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Portillos Inc serves the Chicago street food industry through high-energy and multichannel restaurants. It owns and operates fast-casual restaurants in the United States, along with two food production commissaries in Illinois. Its menu includes hot dogs, beef and sausage sandwiches, sandwiches and ribs, salads, burgers, chicken, Barnelli's pasta, sides and soup, and desserts and shakes.
